Question: In 1994 this person said his image was "like a long shadow ..
Hints: Jagger thought that this person's image had "contributed to him becoming a junkie".
An April 2010 article revealed that this person yearns to be a librarian.
This person has been tried on drug-related charges five times: in 1967, twice in 1973, in 1977 and in 1978.
